text: Usa ne (musa nu) akhi'a ki maim cahuda ham, ki maim apani'am inham dovam beti'am vicom ika da vi'aha tuhade nala kara devam, para sarata hai ki tusim atha sala taka meri naukari karom. Phira jekara tusi' dasa sala pure kara devom tam uha tuhade valom ahisana hovega ate maim tuhanu musibata vica nahim pa'una cahuda. Jekara alaha ne cahi'a tam tusim' mainu caga bada pa'uge
